body: Since this is a utility function we may want to be conservative about throwing an error? For example, what if by some reason one uses an empty FC/Conv bias as an empty tensor? So maybe a warning?
body_html: Since this is a utility function we may want to be conservative about throwing an error? For example, what if by some reason one uses an empty FC/Conv bias as an empty tensor? So maybe a warning?
